channel.title: Help Converting RSPS ints

item.title: Help Converting RSPS ints
item.dc:creator: @josh225 josh225
item.description:
@josh225 wrote:

wrong section for this but this is the conversions

itemDef.anInt165 = itemDef.maleEquip1
itemDef.anInt200 = itemDef.femaleEquip1

this is one of my ints

case 13677:
itemDef.actions = new String[5];
itemDef.actions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.modelID = 13; //Inv & Ground
itemDef.modelZoom = 2000; //Zoom
itemDef.modelRotation1 = 572;
itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1;
itemDef.maleEquip1 = 14; //Male < itemDef.anInt165
itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 14; //Female< itemDef.anInt200
itemDef.anInt175 = -1; < dont change
itemDef.anInt197 = -1; < dont change
itemDef.anInt199 = -1;//noteable < dont change
itemDef.name = “Moderator cape”;
itemDef.description = “Its A moderator Cape”.getBytes();
break;

also you may want to take a look at this: http://www.mediafire.com/?1itzzhmyjnu i didnt make it but i found it when i was having the same problem and it converts just about all of them

Read full topic

item.title: Help Converting RSPS ints
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Chaos Owner Chaos
item.description:
@Owner_Chaos wrote:

Hey guys this happens to be my first post so if it is in the wrong section I apologize and hope you can tell me so that I can move it. I have a problem with ints for my RSPS. It is Project Insanity source. Recently, I have tried to add torva, virtus, and pernix. Are those the right names? If not correct me there too. I got a different form of ints that I am not really familiar with and was thinking maybe you guys could help me convert, point me to a tool that will convert it for me, or send me different ints and models for torva. Here’s what the ints are supposed to look like with the correct format.

	case 13893:
		itemDef.name = "Vesta's plateskirt";
		itemDef.actions = new String[5];
		itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
		itemDef.modelID = 42581;
		itemDef.modelZoom = 1753;
		itemDef.modelRotation1 = 562;
		itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1;
		itemDef.modelOffset2 = 11;
		itemDef.modelOffset1 = -3;
		itemDef.anInt204 = 0;
		itemDef.maleEquip1 = 42633;
		itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 42647;
		itemDef.description = "Vesta's plateskirt.".getBytes();
		break;

Here’s what they look like now.

      case 20135:
              itemDef.modelID = 62714;
              itemDef.name = "Torva full helm";
              itemDef.description = "Torva full helm";
              itemDef.modelZoom = 672;
              itemDef.modelRotation1 = 85;
              itemDef.modelRotation2 = 1867;
              itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
              itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3;
              itemDef.anInt165 = 62738;
              itemDef.anInt200 = 62754;
              itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
              itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
              itemDef.actions = new String[5];
              itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
              itemDef.actions[2] = "Check-charges";
              itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop";
              itemDef.anInt175 = 62729;
              itemDef.anInt197 = 62729;
          break;


       case 20139:
              itemDef.modelID = 62699;
              itemDef.name = "Torva platebody";
              itemDef.description = "Torva platebody";
              itemDef.modelZoom = 1506;
              itemDef.modelRotation1 = 473;
              itemDef.modelRotation2 = 2042;
              itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
              itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
              itemDef.anInt165 = 62746;
              itemDef.anInt200 = 62762;
              itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
              itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
              itemDef.actions = new String[5];
              itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
              itemDef.actions[2] = "Check-charges";
              itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop";
          break;


      case 20143:
              itemDef.modelID = 62701;
              itemDef.name = "Torva platelegs";
              itemDef.description = "Torva platelegs";
              itemDef.modelZoom = 1740;
              itemDef.modelRotation1 = 474;
              itemDef.modelRotation2 = 2045;
              itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0;
              itemDef.modelOffset2 = -5;
              itemDef.anInt165 = 62743;
              itemDef.anInt200 = 62760;
              itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
              itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";
              itemDef.actions = new String[5];
              itemDef.actions[1] = "Wear";
              itemDef.actions[2] = "Check-charges";
              itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop";
          break;

Thanks in advance for your help if i don’t thank you in a reply, and this is my first post as I already said so PLEASE no flaming.

Thanks!

                    Chris
